data.name: RPG Maker MV - Steampunk Town Tiles
data.detailed_description:
With hissing of escaped steam and clanging of pipes and gears, the Steampunk Town is ready for exploration and adventure!

A masterful blend of classic prim Victorian style and heavy machinery, Steampunk is a beloved genre that is bound to make your players curious and amazed. Combining stone with iron and gears, Steampunk Town Tiles includes a variety of basics you'll need to begin creating a novel and engaging environment. Created by Sherman3D, Steampunk Town Tiles is a fantastic new tile pack for your growing library of RPG Maker MV resources.

FEATURES:

  • Basics needed to create a Steampunk-inspired town.
  • Sample project with ideas on how to use the material.
  • Bonus: Character (Verne) with walking sprite and side-view battler.
  • Created and optimized for RPG Maker MV.

data.short_description: With hissing of escaped steam and clanging of pipes and gears, the Steampunk Town is ready for exploration and adventure!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
